title: Sweet potato and rocket salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '4 sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into wedges', '2 red peppers, halved and seeded', '1 clove garlic', '1 shallot', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 dash hot pepper sauce, such as Tabasco', '1 teaspoon salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '125ml extra virgin olive oil', '125ml walnut oil', '225g baby rocket leaves', '1 (5cm) piece Parmigiano Reggiano cheese']
